Test Name: BRAF V600E/V600K Somatic Mutation Analysis, Tumor
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue or fresh/frozen tumor tissue
Purpose: To detect BRAF V600E and V600K somatic mutations in tumor tissue for diagnostic, prognostic, and therapeutic decision-making in cancer patients.
Container: FFPE tissue block or unstained slides; cryovial for fresh/frozen tissue
Equipment: Microcentrifuge, PCR thermocycler, real-time PCR machine, vortex mixer, pipettes with filtered tips, DNA quantification instrument (NanoDrop or Qubit fluorometer)
